idea-plugin.name: GsonFormat-Support4.1
idea-plugin.description:
quickly to convert a JSON string to an InnerClassEntity class ..
openSource

This branch is a fix to the original branch issues, because the original author has not maintained it for a long time, this version supports Android Studio 4.1.

See details
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.4.0

  • New: Support for autovalue
  • New: Support for lombok
  • New: Support for split generate class
1.5.0
  • fix several bug
  • fix unlock setting window size
1.5.1
  • support Android Studio 4.1
